title: Personal Best
brief_description: Several young disabled people speak of the barriers caused by general lack of awareness of their needs, and by some people’s prejudices. Disabled people of all ages are then shown participating in a wide variety of activities. Achievement, at a personal level appropriate to the individual, is the dominant theme.
